title: Action Learning-Based Manufacturing Quality Improvement and Cost Reduction Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic manufacturing processes and quality control concepts
context.additional_context: Adapting real-world manufacturing site cases to educational contexts for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Participants will be able to derive quality improvement plans through the design and execution process of action learning projects.
Learners will be able to set and evaluate cost-reduction goals using manufacturing cost analysis tools.
Participants will be able to develop actionable quality improvement projects through small-group collaboration.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
